# JUBNA

## Example of JUBNA's widget implementation

```html
<amp-embed
  width="200"
  height="200"
  type="jubna"
  layout="responsive"
  data-wid="WIDGET_ID"
  data-pid="PUBLISHER_ID"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact Jubna or refer to their documentation.

### Required parameters

-   `wid`: Widget ID
-   `pid`: Publisher ID || Uniquie ID of your account
